psychological.prompt: How do you typically handle stress?
options: A. I seek support from friends or family.
B. I engage in physical activity or exercise.
C. I practice relaxation techniques like deep breathing or meditation.
D. I distract myself with hobbies or entertainment.

psychological.prompt: How do you cope with failure?
options: A. I try to learn from my mistakes and move forward.
B. I seek validation and reassurance from others.
C. I blame external factors for my failure.
D. I avoid thinking about it and move on quickly.
A. Setting and achieving personal goals.
B. Recognition and praise from others.
C. Competition with others.
D. Financial rewards and incentives.
A. Confident and self-assured.
B. Insecure and doubtful.
C. Balanced and realistic.
D. Constantly striving for improvement.

psychological.prompt: How do you typically handle conflicts?
options: A. I try to find a compromise and resolve the issue peacefully.
B. I assert my own needs and opinions aggressively.
C. I avoid conflicts and keep my feelings to myself.
D. I seek assistance from a mediator or authority figure.

social.prompt: How do you prefer to spend your free time with friends?
options: A. Engaging in outdoor activities or sports.
B. Having deep conversations and sharing emotions.
C. Going to parties or social events.
D. Playing games or watching movies together.

social.prompt: How do you contribute to your community?
options: A. Volunteering for local charities or organizations.
B. Engaging in political activism or social causes.
C. Building relationships and networking.
D. Maintaining a positive and supportive attitude towards others.

social.prompt: How do you deal with peer pressure?
options: A. Asserting my own values and standing up for myself.
B. Going along with the crowd to avoid conflict.
C. Seeking guidance from trusted adults or mentors.
D. Evaluating the situation and making independent decisions.
A. Regularly communicating and spending quality time together.
B. Offering help and support whenever needed.
C. Giving thoughtful gifts and gestures.
D. Sharing common interests and hobbies.

social.prompt: What qualities do you value most in a friend?
options: A. Loyalty and honesty.
B. Humor and lightheartedness.
C. Intelligence and ambition.
D. Kindness and empathy.

academic.prompt: How do you approach studying for exams?
options: A. Creating a structured study schedule and sticking to it.
B. Cramming at the last minute.
C. Collaborating with classmates to study together.
D. Seeking help from tutors or academic resources.

academic.prompt: How do you handle setbacks in your academic performance?
options: A. Analyzing my mistakes and seeking guidance to improve.
B. Giving up and accepting failure.
C. Blaming external factors for my performance.
D. Ignoring the setback and moving on.

academic.prompt: What type of learner are you?
options: A. Visual learner - I learn best through images and diagrams.
B. Auditory learner - I learn best through listening and discussions.
C. Kinesthetic learner - I learn best through hands-on activities.
D. Reading/writing learner - I learn best through reading and writing.

academic.prompt: How do you prioritize your academic workload?
options: A. Tackling the most difficult tasks first.
B. Procrastinating and leaving things until the last minute.
C. Breaking tasks into smaller, manageable chunks.
D. Seeking help from peers or instructors when needed.

academic.prompt: How do you stay organized with your academic responsibilities?
options: A. Using planners or digital calendars to schedule tasks and deadlines.
B. Keeping mental notes and relying on memory.
C. Making to-do lists and checking off completed tasks.
D. Asking others to remind me of important dates and assignments.
A. Achieving personal goals and fulfillment.
B. Attaining wealth and material possessions.
C. Gaining recognition and approval from others.
D. Having power and influence over others.
A. Leadership and decision-making.
B. Creativity and innovation.
C. Empathy and emotional intelligence.
D. Analytical thinking and problem-solving.

self_perception.prompt: How do you handle compliments or praise?
options: A. Accepting graciously and expressing gratitude.
B. Downplaying or deflecting the compliments.
C. Feeling uncomfortable and awkward.
D. Dismissing the compliments as insincere.

self_perception.prompt: What areas do you want to improve upon?
options: A. Time management and organization.
B. Communication and interpersonal skills.
C. Self-confidence and assertiveness.
D. Handling stress and emotions.

self_perception.prompt: How do you handle failure or setbacks?
options: A. Viewing them as opportunities for growth and learning.
B. Feeling discouraged and giving up.
C. Blaming external factors for the failure.
D. Avoiding risks to prevent failure.
